original_text: A man called Joseph was also there. He was one of a special group of important Jewish leaders. He was a good man that wanted to do right things.
korean_text: 공회 의원으로 선하고 의로운 요셉이라 하는 사람이 있으니

sentences.original_text: A man called Joseph was also there.
He was one of a special group of important Jewish leaders.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 중요한 유대 지도자들의 특별한 그룹 중 한 사람이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: that wanted to do right things.
